data.title: Judge's footnote on immigration agents using AI raises accuracy and privacy concerns
data.description: A federal judge has called out an immigration enforcement agent for using artificial intelligence to write the narrative of a use-of-force report as just a small part of a scathing opinion that rebutted federal officials' narratives about appropriate force used against protesters and others during a
data.keywords: Artificial intelligence, Law enforcement, Chicago, Immigration, General news, Illinois, IL State Wire, Local News for Apple, George Washington, Technology, U.S. news, Ian Adams, Sara Ellis, Katie Kinsey
